snippet: Ms. Vieira, the former co-host of NBC's "Today" show, is said to be in talks with another division of NBCUniversal about hosting a syndicated talk show that would start no sooner than September 2014.
abstract: Ms. Vieira, the former co-host of NBC's "Today" show, is said to be in talks with another division of NBCUniversal about hosting a syndicated talk show that would start no sooner than September 2014.

headline.main: Meredith Vieira Said to Be in Talks for Daytime Show
headline.print_headline: Vieira Eyeing New Role As Talk Show Host
